inn1.comm: good length on the middle stump. It moves away after pitching and Taylor defends it carefully. Mashrafe oversteps

and a nightmare start! Fuller ball outside the off stump. Taylor opens his arms and drives it to extra-cover. Shuvo moves to his left and fields. He sees that Taylor is half-way down the pitch and throws it to the keeper's end. Rahim need not even lay a finger on it as the throw takes the bails off. Run-out of a free-hit!
good length ball outside the off stump. Dabengwa comes forward and pushes it to the off side
fuller on the pads. Dabengwa comes forward and turns it to square-leg
good length ball outside the off stump. Dabengwa moves across and lets it pass to the keeper
fuller outside the off stump. Dabengwa comes forward and opens the face of the bat as he pushes it to point
good length ball on the off stump. Dabengwa comes forward and defends it to cover
good length ball outside the off stump. Masakadza comes forward in defense and is struck on the pads on the same line. Shafiul appeals but it can't be given out
how close was that! Masakadza looks to cut a short ball outside the off stump and gets an inside edge onto his pads and the ball drifts away
good length ball outside the off stump. Masakadza lets the ball pass
fuller on the off and middle. Masakadza comes forward and drives it to mid-on
good length ball coming in from outside the off stump. Masakadza comes forward and pushes it to cover
fuller on the pads. Masakadza turns it to leg side for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Masakadza pushes it to point and sets off for a non-existent single. If the throw by Raqibul was direct, Masakadza would have been run-out too
short outside the off stump. Masakadza plays it with soft hands and runs across for a quick single. He was hesitant to take the run but takes it
good length ball outside the off stump. Dabengwa comes forward and defends it
short and wide outside the off stump. Dabengwa cuts it to third man for a couple
short outside the off stump. Dabengwa moves across and loos to cut it but is beaten by the movement
fuller on the pads. Dabengwa leans across and turns it to midwicket for a single
good length ball on the middle stump. Dabengwa opens the face of the bat and pushes it to point
fuller in length on the off stump. The ball moves away after pitching. Dabengwa looks to drive and is beaten. Shafiul has a few words to say to the batsman
on the middle and leg. Dabengwa tucks it to midwicket
good length ball on the middle and off. Dabengwa comes forward and looks to defend as he gets an inside edge back onto the pads
good length ball outside the off stump. Dabengwa looks to run it down and is beaten
good length ball outside the off stump and moving away. Dabengwa shoulders arms and lets it pass to the keeper

good length ball on the off and middle. Masakadza drives it to long-off and gets three runs. There could have been a chance of run-out if the throw had been proper as Dabengwa was looking at the ball when Masakadza is running for the third
good length ball outside the off stump. Dabengwa comes forward and pushes it to cover for a single
good length ball outside the off stump. Masakadza comes forward and drives it to mid-off
short outside the off stump. Masakadza gets onto the backfoot and drives it to short extra cover
good length ball left alone outside the off stump
fuller outside the off stump. Masakadza comes forward and drives it to short extra-cover, who deflects it to mid-off
on the pads as Dabengwa pushes it to deep square-leg for a single
fuller length ball outside the off stump. Masakadza comes forward and drives. Shafiul leaps across to his left on the follow through and fields the ball
good length ball outside the off stump. Masakadza comes forward and drives it to cover
full and wide outside the off stump. Masakadza comes forward and drives it to cover point. An oppotunity missed that

good length ball on the middle stump. Masakadza comes forward and turns it to the leg side. The callinf seems to have ceased as Masakadza realises late that Dabengwa is not interested in the run and runs back. Shuvo's throw is a little wayward and Masakadza survives
pushes it to midwicket for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Masakadza drives it to cover

and the cracks come into play! Good length ball outside the off stump and coming in. Masakadza looks to play across the line and the bounce deceives him. He is struck on the flap of the back pad and the umpire has no hesitation in raising the index finger as Masakadza was playing on the backfoot. As a colleague of mine would say "Plumb as they come"
good length ball on the off stump. Ervine comes forward and defends it
fuller on the middle stump. Ervine comes forward and turns it to square-leg
good length ball on the middle stump. Ervine comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
good length ball defended to the leg side
on the off stump. Dabengwa runs it down to third man for a single
short ball outside the off stump. Ervine moves across and shoulders arms
good length ball outside the off stump. Ervine shoulders arms and lets it pass to the keeper. Rahim fumbles with the take and looks at the pitch
good length ball, moving away after pitching. Ervine lets it pass to the keeper
good length ball outside the off stump. Ervine moves across and lets it pass again
good length ball outside the off stump. Ervine moves across and lets it pass to the keeper yet again. Done it five times out of five this over
good length ball on the middle stump. Dabengwa comes forward and pushes it to midwicket for a single
finally Ervine decides to lay some wood on the ball as he comes forward and defends a ball to the off side
on the middle stump. Ervine leans across and pushes it to midwicket
drifts onto the pads as Ervine flicks it to fine-leg for a couple and gets off the mark in the process
fuller outside the off stump. Ervine comes forward and drives it past mid-off for a couple
yorker on the middle stump. Ervine defends it to short midwicket
fuller outside the off stump. Dabengwa looks to drive it and gets an outside edge to third-man for a single
good length ball outside the off stump. Ervine comes forward and punches it to cover
short outside the off stump. Ervine looks to play it down as he gets a bottom edge to third-man for a single
slower ball outside the off stump. Dabengwa comes forward and drives it to cover
off-cutter outside the off stump. Dabengwa looks to run it down to third-man and is beaten by the lack of pace
short and wide outside the off stump. Dabengwa looks to cut it and gets a top edge to third man for a single

and Mash has struck again! he has been pretty consistent with his line and length today, this one was slightly angled across the left-hander from just back of a length, it rapped him on the back pad around off stump as he pushed outside the line from the crease, umpire Asoka raised the finger right away, Zimbabwe are in disarray
bowls it fuller, again around that off stump, Taibu gets to the pitch and drives to mid off
in the channel outside off, he leaves it alone, and Rahim gets hit flush on the knee as the ball bounces before him, that hurts, he is down on the ground, it absolutely died on its way to the keeper

looks to steer this one down to third man, gets too close to the line of the delivery, and ends up chopping it close to the stumps on the off side, it bounced a bit more too, slip runs forward to field
lets this one outside the off stump go through to Rahim
goes on his toes to this back of a length ball and plays it back down the track, Mash fields in his followthrough
tossed up nicely on middle and leg, gets forward to defend
flights it on off now, he gets an inside edge as he presses forward, it went straight on
pushed back down the track, good start from Naeem
fired in on middle from very wide of the crease, he defends it back to the bowler
gets an inside edge and takes the single as the ball goes backward of square, short fine leg tidies up
tossed up on middle and leg to the right-hander, he plays it out to midwicket to end a good first over
stays on the back foot and pings mid off with the punch to a length ball
angled across and finishing just outside off, he leans across and forward to defend towards cover
comes in off the seam and tucks him up around leg stump, he works it away square for a single
goes straight as an arrow in the corridor outside off, Taibu has nothing to do with it, Mash has progressively stepped it up in this series
the little man taps this in front of extra cover and hares across for the single, even Shuvo can't beat him to the crease with a diving throw
can't do much with those, right on target on the stumps, defended into the on side
defended towards extra cover off the front foot
makes room outside leg but cannot get the timing on the cut, not much turn for Naeem
rocks back and punches, but straight to extra cover, missed out there
works this away in front of square leg where a diving stop cannot prevent the single
pushed out to midwicket off the front foot
gets a leading edge as he pushes at this one on leg stump, the ball stopped a bit on him, but it falls safely way short of mid on
comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
comes forward and pushes it to cover
turns it to midwicket for a single
on the leg stump. Ervine comes forward and defends it to midwicket
comes forward and pushes it  back to the bowler
turns it behind square for a single
pushes it to midwicket as he comes forward to a ball on the off stump
comes forward and takes it on the full as he pushes it to deep midwicket for a single

on the leg stump. Ervine turns it to short fine-leg

comes forward and drives it to cover

off the outside edge to first slip. It just fell short of the diving fielder

outside the off stump. Taibu pushes it to cover

the partnership comes to an end! Ervine looks to reverse sweep it and gets a top edge that settles easily in Rahim's gloves. And can you believe the fact that it is the first wicket for spin today!! Shows how well Taibu and Ervine have played the spinners
off the pads to short fine-leg for a leg-bye
an arm ball speared onto the legs. Rahim belts out an appeal but immediately negated by the umpire
on the leg stump. Chigumbara turns it to fine-leg for a couple
fuller on the middle stump. Chigumbara drives it to midwicket
comes forward and pushes it to cover
fuller outside the off stump. Chigumbara comes back and defends it
on the leg stump. Chigumbara runs a leg-bye
an arm-ball on the off stump. Chigumbara lofts it over wide long-on for a huge six
on the leg stump and struck on the pads. It would have been going down leg
comes forward and defends it to off side
fuller outside the off stump. Chigumbara drives it to long-off for a single

Chigumbara pushes it to midwicket for a single

fuller outside the off stump. Taibu chips it over extra-cover for a couple

comes forward and pushes it to point

and the strangling line works as Chigumbara rocks back and looks to pull it away. He does not get  enough bat on it . Raqibul running in from long-on takes an easy catch. Shakib wins the battle of the captains
short outside the off stump. Taibu cuts it to deep point for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Utseya drives it to long-off for a single and gets off the mark
fuller outside the off stump. Utseya drives it back to the bowler
struck on the pads outside the off stump
on the off stump. Utseya comes down the track and lofts it over the infield on the leg side as the ball runs away to the long-on boundary
straight ball outside the off stump. Utseya looks to slog it and is beaten
turns it to fine-leg for a single
short on the middle stump. Taibu makes room and lofts it over long-on for his first six
outside the off stump. Utseya moves across and sweeps it to deep midwicket for a couple
fuller outside the off stump. Utseya drives it to cover for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Taibu makes room and looks to go inside out. He gets the shot right but it has no elevation as it settles in the hands of Mashrafe at extra-cover
comes forward and defends it
fuller on the off stump. Chakabva sweeps it past midwicket for a boundary
wide down the leg stump and Rahim misses a stumping chance as Chakabva comes down the track and misses the line of the ball. They run a couple more as Shafiul pulls it back in
Chakabva makes the extra ball count as he comes down the track and lofts it to over long-on for a boundary. Shakib does not finish with flattering figures in terms of economy rate
on the off stump. Utseya pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
slower ball outside the off stump. Chakabva mistimes a scoop shot to short fine-leg for a single

short ball outside the off stump. Chakabva pulls it and gets a top-edge that falls in the no-mans land at midwicket
fuller outside the off stump. Utseya drives it to cover for a single
fuller on the off stump. Chakabva slogs it to deep midwicket where Shuvo had the catch covered but does not take it and what more, he relays it to the ropes and concedes a boundary

inn2.comm: on the leg stump. It hits Tamim  on the pads as he runs across for a leg-bye
good length ball on the off stump. Imrul sticks to the crease and defends it to the off side
fuller on the leg stump. Imrul leans across and turns it to deep backward square-leg for a couple

and there's the first blood! Imrul goes for the cut shot with his feet moving nowhere and does not quite reach the ball. As he does not reach the ball properly, he only manages to get an outside edge back to the keeper. Taibu takes it comfortably and the Zimbabwean camp is happy
good length ball on the pads. Junaid moves across and turns it to fine-leg for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Tamim drives it past cover for a single
good length ball outside the off stump. Tamim, with his feet stuck to the crease pushes it to cover
comes down the track and drives it to extra-cover
fuller outside the off stump. Tamim drives it to long-off for a single
good length ball outside the off stump. Junaid comes forward and defends it to back onto the pitch
fuller outside the off stump. Junaid drives it back to the bowler
outside the off stump. Junaid comes forward and drives it to extra-cover
good length ball outside the off stump. Junaid gets his feet to the pitch of the ball as he drives it to short extra-cover
fuller on the leg stump. Tamim pushes it to fine-leg for a single
good length ball outside the off stump. Junaid comes forward and drives it to short extra-cover
he nearly had his second wicket there! It was a ball pitched on the off stump and got to move it away from the batsman. Junaid was feeling for it and he was very lucky not to get any edge on it
fuller in length on the middle stump. Junaid pushes it back to the bowler. Mpofu threatens to throw it back to the bowler. Crowd go up in  unison against Mpofu
fuller outside off. Junaid comes forward and pushes it to point
comes forward and drives it to extra-cover
fuller outside the off stump. Tamim comes down the track and drives it to extra-cover
fuller outside the off stump. Tamim comes down the track and drives it to long-off for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Junaid comes down the track and drives it back to the bowler, who deflects it to mid-off
fuller on the middle and off. Tamim comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
off the back pad to first slip
wide down the leg stump and to add to the woes, the ball runs to the fine-leg boundary
fuller outside the off stump. Junaid comes forward and drives it to cover
good length ball on the middle and off. Junaid comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
on the leg stump and slower in pace. Junaid is foxed by the lack of the pace and checks his shot as it flies over Utseya at square-leg for a couple. Lucky Junaid

and more drama here now as Junaid flicks it directly to Utseya at square-leg. He takes it and immediately asks for the third umpire to intervene. Replays are inconclusive and the benefit of doubt goes to the batsman
good length ball outside the off stump. Junaid comes forward and pushes it to point
good length ball outside the off stump. Junaid comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
fuller ball outside the off stump. Tamim drives it back to the bowler
on the off stump. Tamim comes down the track and drives it to extra-cover
on the middle stump. Tamim looks to sweep it and gets an inside edge to pads. Tamim shows his bat to the umpire. It can be dangerous in terms of fines
fuller outside the stump. Tamim comes forward and drives it to cover
pushes it to long-off for a single
good length ball on the off stump. Tamim flicks it to deep midwicket for a couple
good length ball outside the off stump. Tamim goes for the slog and gets an inside edge to square-leg
short on the leg stump. Tamim contracts his body and pulls it over square-leg for a boundary. So it takes Bangladesh six overs what it took Zimbabwe more than twenty overs to achieve- a boundary
short outside the off stump. Tamim nearly does an Imrul as he looks to cut it away without being in any position to cut it. The bounce takes the ball over the bat
good length ball outside the off stump. Tamim comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
fuller in length on the middle stump. Tamim covers the line of the stumps and defends it back onto the pitch
comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
comes forward and drives it to cover
pushes it to long-off for a single
short outside the off stump. Tamim cuts it to deep point for three runs
good length ball on the middle stump. Tamim looks to go over the leg side and gets an inside edge to fine-leg for a boundary
good length ball outside the off stump. Tamim comes forward and drives it to cover
fuller outside the off stump. Tamim lofts it over long-off for a six. Initially it seemed as if that ball was going nowhere but the timing was such that it seemed very effortless
fuller outside the off stump. Tamim guides it to first slip
fuller outside the off stump. Tamim drives it to mid-off
Drop! Tamim is deceived by the pace and chips it back to the bowler who makes a mess of the catch
outside the off stump. Junaid comes forward and defends it
comes forward and pushes it to the leg side
fuller outside the off stump. Junaid drives it back to the bowler

Price getting through this over quickly, one the pads, defended to the leg side
again on the pads, blocked back towards the bowler
starts with a length ball that turns in, defended off the front foot

punched crisply off the back foot towards extra cover
on the pads, Tamim plays it watchfully to the leg side
the crowds goes wild as Tamim brings up his half-century with a sweep towards square leg
guided towards short fine leg for a single to end the over
driven along the ground to long-on for a single
short of length and heading for off, stands tall and punches it towards mid-off
a bit fuller, eased towards long-off for a single

defended towards mid-off this time
he wasn't thinking about defending that one, charges down and blasts it over the bowler for a one-bounce four, he wants to get this over with in a jiffy
tucked behind square leg for a single
smash! Tamim is down the track again and hammers it over long-on for a massive six, the locl boy gives the crowd some entertainment
tucked towards midwicket for a single
punched towards mid-on, where Chigumbura misfields to give away a single
Tamim looks to launch another one into orbit, can't get  to the pitch of the ball and is struck on the ribs as he tries to mow that one
sensibly take the single by clipping the ball towards midwicket
looks for the cut, the ball dribbles past the keeper after taking the bottom-edge

just clears the man at square leg, Tamim went for the lofted sweep, didn't get hold of it as well as he would have liked, Zimbabwe fielders have their hands on their heads as the ball sails over the fielder for four to bring up Bangladesh's 100

gets out in a temptation to go for the eighth. He comes down the track and mistimes a lofted shot into the leg side. Cremer runs in from deep midwicket and dives forward to complete the catch. He was just five runs away from the century. The crowd has been silenced as Tamim is a local boy but what entertainment till it lasted
